channel.title: Potassium on From Fish To Physician

item.title: Sugar and spice and all things nice
item.description: In this post… Electrolyte-free water clearance can help assess disorders of sodium homeostasis Potassium supplementation can help in cases of hyponatraemia What are we made of? What are little girls made of? What are little girls made of? Sugar and spice And all things nice That’s what little girls are made of — Nursery Rhyme Well we are not made of sugar and spice - but what are we made of?
